title: Probabilistic Graphical Models (PGMs) In Python | Graphical Models Tutorial | Edureka
excerpt: (** www.edureka.co/graphical-modelling-course **) This Edureka "Graphical Models" video answers the question "Why do we need Probabilistic Graphical Models?" and how are they compare to Neural Networks. It takes you through the basics of PGMs and gives real-world examples of its applications.  [01:02]
